title: Love Letter
subtitle: Get to the secret spot, find a letter and deliver it to Misty.

title: Missing Goods
subtitle: Talk to Lewis, pick up the goods, return to kathy, deliver the chicks to Mrs. Wilson.

title: Swing By the Horse Farm
subtitle: Deliver horse figurine to Mike Gibson's at the horse farm, go to Mike's stable, muck out the stables (12 manure), calm the 4 horses, pick up carrot, treat the horse that likes carrots, pick up an apple, ..., pick up a celery, ..., pick up a sugar cube, ..., tell mike you're done, tell mike you're done.
